1.name: WeakPasswordHashing
1.At: Using single SHA256 without salt or iterations

2.name: UnreachableValidationCode
2.At: _validate_phone has an early 'return True' making regex unreachable

3.name: RaceCondition_FileWrite
3.At: Loading whole DB into memory and writing full JSON without locks

4.name: SilentDataLossOnParseError
4.At: JSON parse failure falls back to empty DB without backup

6.name: MissingReferentialChecksOnDelete
6.At: delete_category/tag does not check for existing references

7.name: LackOfBusinessValidation
7.At: add_entry does not validate amount/title/note strictly

8.name: MissingOwnershipCheck
8.At: add_tag_to_entry does not check entry/tag ownership

10.name: ExportRobustness
10.At: export_to_xlsx assumes fields like entry.images are lists and non-null
